revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=CTR500 |revision= |upc=804879120162 |asin=B001963VPU |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WRT-213U |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/10/2008 |fcc_id=UXX-CTR500 |ic_id=6921A-CTR500 |type=wireless router, travel router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP5100U |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, ExpressCard/34 (USB) |expansion_expresscard_num=1 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=U-MEDIA WMD-202A |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=CTR500-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^CTR500-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:30:44 |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Mobile Broadband Travel Router}} :[http://www.cradlepoint.com/products/machine-to-machine-routers/ctr500-mobile-broadband-travel-router Product page]
The default SSID is, according to the FCC label, '''CTR-500-xxx'''. WiGLE data backs this up and shows :that the '''xxx''' is the last three digits of the wireless interface MAC address (lower case letters).
Per the [http://www.cradlepoint.com/sites/default/files/productdocs/CradlePoint_CTR500_QSG_02-2010.pdf Quick Start Guide], the default administrator password is the last six digits of the MAC :address found on the bottom of the router.
==Images== <gallery> File:Cradlepoint ctr500 router highres.jpg File:Cradlepoint ctr500 sideview expresscard.jpg File:Cradlepoint ctr500 sideview.jpg File:Cradlepoint ctr500 sideview usb-ethernet-on-off.jpg File:Cradlepoint ctr500 sideview reset signalstrength.jpg </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
